user_question: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life?
final_answer: To apply minimalism to your digital life, you can declutter your digital devices by deleting unused apps, organizing files into essential folders, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, and setting screen time limits to focus on meaningful activities.
